alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued May 08 at 9:47PM MDT until May 09 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Debeque to Silt Corridor and Central Colorado River Basin. * WHEN...Until 1 AM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Central Colorado River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor
